title: How many books on average does a person read? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Pew Research Center released its latest data on American reading habits, and the results show some interesting — and somewhat surprising — trends. Roughly 72 per cent of American adults read a book in 2015, continuing a gradual decline over the last 5 years (from 79 per cent in 2011). However, these stats include people who reported reading “one book…in part”, so it’s unclear how many made it all the way through. The average number of books each person read over the course of a year was 12…but that number is inflated by the most avid readers. The most frequently reported number was 4 books per year. Of course, there’s plenty of variation among demographics.
